name: Robocode-kkc-pikachu
body:
##Welcome to robocode-kkc-pikachu Project!

![robocode-kkc-pikachu](https://raw.github.com/kcanida/robocode-kkc-pikachu/master/images/robocode-battlefield.png)
##About the robot
robocode-kkc-pikachu is a [Robocode](http://robocode.sourceforge.net/) robot implementing the following strategy

**Movement:** Pikachu robot always stays at a 90 degree angle to the enemy robot.  It tracks the energy level of the enemy and when there is a small drop in energy it assumes the enemy just fired a bullet so Pikachu changes its direction.  

**Targeting:** Pikachu uses its radar to scan for the enemy robot. It continually oscillates the radar so it can continually track the enemy.  

**Firing** Pikachu uses its radar to calculate where the enemy is and aims its gun at the enemy. Pikachu then fires a bullet at the enemy with power based on the distance of the enemy. The further the enemy from Pikachu, the weaker the power of the bullet fired.
